title: Spacious Renovated 3BR, 2BA Condo, Modern Kitchen, Hdwd Flrs, W-D, Pkg
posting_body: Great 3 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom Apartment located in East Arlington near Davis Square & the Redline, Arlington Square, Tufts University and easy access to get into Cambridge, Somerville and Boston !
Please Text or Call Craig Scanzio at 617-758-9763 and reference ID #80a-303330111 to setup a showing.
When you respond, please leave your full name and the best phone number to call or text you back!
Beautiful  3 Bedroom  Condo in two family home in East Arlington !
Spacious open concept living/dining room on 1st floor with office alcove.
o 1.4 miles from Davis Square Redline & Buses
o Living Room, Dining Room, Kitchen & Rear Balcony are on 1st Floor
o Gorgeous Modern Kitchen - Granite counter tops, Stainless Appliances.
Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher & Beautiful Cabinets!
o Master Bedroom &(2) Bathrooms also on 1st Level; Master Bath has jetted tub!
o Spacious bedrooms with generous closet space.
o Apartment features Central Air Conditioning
o Nice Office Alcove on 1st floor for working from home
o Large shared Patio in Back Yard.
o Off street Parking on left side of  driveway with one Garage spot.
o Tenants pay all Utilities:  Gas, Electric and Water!
o Great  location:  Close to Bus Line to get around Arlington, close to theater and fabulous restaurants.
o Easy bus ride  to Davis Square/Redline T and great access to get into Boston!
Deposits of 1st Month, Security Deposit & Brokers’ Fee requested along with Good Credit and References with application!
The advertised price & availability must be confirmed at the time of showing.
